The Mr Bean team have a FREE redemption code - mrbeanstock2012 - so you can create your very own hilarious Mr Bean message! http://apps.facebook.com/mrbean-app/ http://apps.facebook.com/mrbean-app/ Animated Messaging Application

Hello everyone! The Mr Bean team are super excited about the brand new game app we have just for our Facebook fans! Click on the link to play - http://www.facebook.com/MrBean/app_208195102528120 Timeline Photos

For those of you who have finished your studies for the summer, the Mr Bean team hope you have a wonderful long break!

Mr Bean’s really looking forward to the summer holidays because he has decided to go on an adventure and do some travelling! Watch this space for updates on where he’s been and what he’s been up to...
 
Do you have anything fun planned for the summer?
Hooray! The sun is shining for the first day of the Wimbledon tournament! Here’s hoping it lasts. Good luck to everyone competing from the Mr Bean team! Timeline Photos

Exciting news everyone! Mr Bean now has an official Pinterest page for you to follow and the Mr Bean team are constantly keeping an eye out for interesting and creative things relating to him so be sure to upload all things Bean to Pinterest. Your work may get pinned to his very special board! http://pinterest.com/officialmrbean/ Timeline Photos

Mr Bean loses Teddy while out shopping! Mr Bean - Where's My Teddy Mr.Bean runs into trouble at the supermarket!
It's time for Mr Bean and Teddy to get ready for their camping trip! Mr Bean - Preparing To Go Camping Mr Bean and Teddy are off on a camping holiday but first they need to pack their things!

Teddy wants to watch TV! How will Mr Bean turn it on whilst he’s away?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cJk4_6qf5nE Mr. Bean - TV for Teddy Mr. Bean is enjoying his getaway but needs to turn the television on for Teddy who is miles away. Watch how he achieves it! FOR MORE BEAN CLICK HERE: http://...
With a full tan and an empty wallet Mr Bean and Teddy have arrived home in LONDON! What a brilliant holiday that was! Timeline Photos
It’s the last stop on Mr Bean and Teddy’s Summer Holiday and they are on familiar ground. Can you spot Teddy one last time and work out which city they are in? Timeline Photos
Teddy was stuck in a cactus. Ouch! Mr Bean and Teddy are in MEXICO! Just one more flight to go on Mr Bean’s Around the World tour. Timeline Photos
After the exhaustion of another flight Mr Bean has tripped over a cactus patch and let go of Teddy! Where has he thrown him? Can you guess which country they are in? Timeline Photos

Another week and another holiday stop. In the chaos of a new city Mr Bean has lost Teddy. YET AGAIN! He really needs to take better care of him. Can you spot Teddy and guess where they are? Timeline Photos

After a long flight, Mr Bean has arrived and Teddy has gone off exploring without him! 

Where are they and where is Teddy? Check back for answers tomorrow. Timeline Photos

It’s time for Mr Bean and Teddy’s Summer Holiday!!! They are going AROUND THE WORLD!

Can you guess where they are and find Teddy? Mr Bean seems to have lost him...

Check back for the answers tomorrow. Timeline Photos
What is that stinky stink?  Poor Teddy, Mr Bean didn't give him a snorkel and mask to save him from the smell. Timeline Photos

Yes, home sweet home!  Nelson’s Column in Trafalgar Square, London.
Mr Bean and Teddy had a really fun holiday! Timeline Photos
Final destination.  What are Mr Bean and Teddy  in front of today? Timeline Photos
Mr Bean and Teddy travel 2,795 miles/4,496kms to find themselves in front of an impressive ancient structure in a very hot place.  But what is this structure? Timeline Photos

Mr Bean really tries to make this selfie a good one.  Oh dear, he can’t get the camera angle right.  In front of which famous building are Mr Bean and Teddy.  Clue: it was built in marble and represents the love of a husband for his wife! Timeline Photos
Yes!  That’s right! Mr Bean and Teddy are posing in front of the Eiffel Tower! Timeline Photos
Another city, another rubbish selfie!  Which famous landmark are Mr Bean and Teddy standing in front of?  Answer tomorrow. Timeline Photos
Ta Da! Mr Bean and Teddy are posing in front of The Statue of Liberty, New York!! Timeline Photos

Mr Bean and Teddy are on holiday! They want to take photos of all their favourite landmarks but Mr Bean is rubbish at selfies. Can you work out where they are? Check back in tomorrow for the answer! Timeline Photos
